text: Is there a way to set a default folder for a file/image upload in a module or even for the featured image? It'd be nice to be able to default to a specific folder on the server when the user clicks upload.
pretty sure they recently released the CMS API

Hey Cory, this is not something that is possible currently. Would you be able to add this to our ideas forum (<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/custom/page/page-id/ideaslandingpage>) and then post a link back to it here so others can upvote the idea as well?
